response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be a great asset for you, given its worth of $12,000 to you. Considering the high value both parties place on this product, I propose a fair transaction price of $13,500. This offer allows us to recoup more than our cost while providing you with a valuable acquisition at a reasonable price. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting this business together.", "product_price": 13500}
